mapper.insert: insert into RouteDefinition(service_name, service_hash, path, path_hash) values(#{serviceName}, #{serviceHash}, #{path}, #{pathHash})
mapper.delete: delete from RouteDefinition where path_hash = #{pathHash} and service_hash = #{serviceHash}
mapper.update: create table if not exists RouteDefinition ( id int not null primary key auto_increment, service_name varchar(50) not null, service_hash int not null, path int not null, path_hash varchar(50) not null );
mapper.select: select id, service_name, path from RouteDefinition
